name: Pandora Needs Glasses
description: Fixes text blurring in WebKit browsers, and makes the layout actually responsive instead of reserving weird space on the right.
additional_info:
With the new Pandora React update, the interface has finally switched away from Flash! However, there's some slight problems that have been annoying me... like the blurry text! Plus, when shrinking the window there was always some weird gutter on the right, and some elements were oddly placed.

Known issues:
 - When changing songs, the Now Playing text is briefly in the wrong place.
